subject: RE-VALIDATION: Events v1.13.4 WORSE - Now Missing 38 Events!
body:
Team,

Re-tested after Fulton's v1.13.4 deployment:

## CURRENT STATUS
| Endpoint | Express | AF TEST | Delta | Status |
|----------|---------|---------|-------|--------|
| Organizers | 49 | 47 | -2 | NO CHANGE |
| Venues | 64 | 66 | +2 | NO CHANGE |
| Events | 384 | 346 | **-38** | WORSE! |

## EVENTS REGRESSION
- Before v1.13.4: AF had +10 extra events (394)
- After v1.13.4: AF missing 38 events (346)
- Express still: 384

Fulton - The isActive=true default fix overcorrected. Now missing too many events.

Ben already confirmed filter logic:
- Organizers: NO default isActive filter
- Venues: NO default isActive filter
- Events: DEFAULT isActive=true

Organizers and Venues still not fixed.

- Sarah
